root: ^“7 days left, huh what have I even been doing. I'm a journalist for christ sake, I should be out there.”
^“What does it matter if the world is ending…”
^“You know what? No, the world hasn't ended yet! These are our last moments,I'm gonna document it, even if it's just for me!”
^“It's a beautiful city with beautiful people in it, let’s see who I can find. I can't spend my last days alone.”
^“Maybe I can even grab a few photos for old times sake.”
^“Now, where could I find people at a time like this… Oh! A cafe, or a bar maybe. I'll start there.”
^“Let me not forget my camera and notebook.”
